mapper.select: SELECT NP.NOTICE_POST_NUMBER, NP.NOTICE_TYPE_ID, NP.ADMIN_NUMBER, NP.TEAM_NUMBER, NP.NOTICE_POST_TITLE, NP.NOTICE_POST_DATE, NP.NOTICE_POST_UPDATE, NP.NOTICE_POST_CONTENT, AT.ATTACHMENT_NUMBER, AT.ATTACHMENT_PATH, AT.ATTACHMENT_NAME FROM TBL_NOTICE_POST NP LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT AT ON NP.NOTICE_POST_NUMBER = AT.NOTICE_POST_NUMBER WHERE NP.NOTICE_POST_NUMBER = #{noticePostNumber}
SELECT COUNT(NOTICE_POST_NUMBER) FROM TBL_NOTICE_POST WHERE NOTICE_TYPE_ID = 2 AND TEAM_NUMBER = #{teamNumber}
